rsvp.title: Send us your RSVP
rsvp.busTo: Do you want to take the private bus to the venue?
rsvp.busFrom: Do you want to take the private bus back to the city?
rsvp.noBus: No, thank you. I will sort my own transportation
rsvp.speech: Do you want to say a few words during the dinner?
rsvp.attendance: Will you be attending the wedding?

location.title: The venue
location.directions: How to get to the venue

car.title: Get here by car
car.directions: Just put the address in Google Maps and follow the directions to the venue. There is free parking on the premises.

program.title: The program
program.drinksText: We sip on something sparking and make the rounds
program.endText: Thank you for having been here
